history.proof: intros n. induction n as [| n' IHn]. - split; reflexivity. - destruct IHn as [H1 H2]. sfirstorder depth: 3use: opp_succZ, opp_predZ.

original: intros n. induction n as [| n' IHn]. - split; reflexivity. - destruct IHn as [H1 H2]. split; [rewrite opp_succZ, H2| rewrite opp_predZ, H1]; reflexivity.
